Html:
This is just merly a cosmetic issue, but it complicates things for a parser I am building for exported CSV files of gear lists. The thing is that there seems to be no "standard" for the names used for summary stats. Some use "Burst DPS" while in a nother model is called "DPS-Burst" and such. Also, why for all melee classes the sumarry stats are not the same? Some track DPS and others DPS and Survailability.

I just wish you could make names more standard and similar for similar specs.

Thanks,

 

Foam
Standardizing ratings is one of the things we've got planned for Rawr3.
